name: Just Shapes with Some Music
description:
Goal: Survive until the end of the level. Controls:
Use sword to block projectiles. Left Mouse Button - Swing Sword
Right Mouse Button - Spin Each click costs energy. Use energy wisely to block projectiles.

Left Bar - Health Right Bar - Energy

Move mouse to aim where character is looking M - Back To Menu
R - Restart WASD - movement

You can only get hit 5 times
Only projectiles can be destroyed.

Theme Justification: I took it as the music going more and more fire as the music goes on. I also took turn up the heat literally so I made the difficulty increase as the music goes longer.

completely orignal idea

definitely not jsab
(inspired by jsab)

Credits:

https://derpyfood.itch.io
